channel.title: [Aggroth V2] Official
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Hello people, my name is Shaloxis. Recently, i have been restarting my old project, it's called Aggroth, some of you might have heard of it because i released it. I have bought a vps and a webhost, and a .com domain, and i hope you will enjoy my server alot. Here it is
[color=blue][url=http://aggroth.com/]Website[/url] [url=http://aggrothforums.webege.com/]Forums[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/webclient.php]Play Now![/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/110629812/AggrothClient.jar]Download[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/110629812/AggrothSetup.exe]Download setup[/url][/color]
[/size] [img]http://aggroth.com/img/logo.png[/img] [size=12pt]Features: -Full custom nex with emotes, 3 styles of attack, and it drops really nice. -Full custom nomad with 3 emotes, and 3 styles of attack. -A custom dungeoneering skill -A custom pking skill -No more fixed stats (all 99) -A snow texture pack -Vine whip, glacor boots, torva (maybe + effect not sure) -Wilderness edge removed -All 602 dialogues -Custom npc's with 2 shops in each -Oldschool - newschool mixed feeling -You can change the gameframe -A custom leveling points system -A full trivia system -So much more! -Fixed bank all lag -A full dicers rank [img]http://puu.sh/4j3Ve.png[/img] -Player stores + collecting and a custom ::myshop command
Now running on a 4G RAM 1 tb space VPS, so no lag.[/size]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4lB.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j4mw.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j3Nm.png[/img]

[img]http://puu.sh/4j42x.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j43z.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j44t.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j45z.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j469.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j46W.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j47t.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j49f.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4aN.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4cn.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j4dl.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j4eB.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4jx.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4gk.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j4hG.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/4j4YJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j50s.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4j524.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]I hope to see you ingame, we still have a lack of staff.[/size]

item.title: [Aggroth V2] Official
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Please stay on topic to the advertisement, any further disagreements among team and ex-team members can be settled through the PM system or external means such as Skype.
Thanks, and good luck with your server.

Read full topic

item.title: [Aggroth V2] Official
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

The server seems to have no unique features which would drive me into playing it, currently to me it just seems like any other server in the advertisement/downloads section. Try to add some unique features and get rid of unwanted/un-needed features.

I wish you the best of luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [Aggroth V2] Official
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[size=10pt]Hello people, my name is Shaloxis.
Recently, i have been restarting my old project, it’s called Aggroth, some of you might have heard of it because i released it.
I have bought a vps and a webhost, and a .com domain, and i hope you will enjoy my server alot.
Here it is

[color=blue]Website
Forums
Play Now!
Download
Download setup[/color]

[/size]

[size=12pt]Features:
-Full custom nex with emotes, 3 styles of attack, and it drops really nice.
-Full custom nomad with 3 emotes, and 3 styles of attack.
-A custom dungeoneering skill
-A custom pking skill
-No more fixed stats (all 99)
-A snow texture pack
-Vine whip, glacor boots, torva (maybe + effect not sure)
-Wilderness edge removed
-All 602 dialogues
-Custom npc’s with 2 shops in each
-Oldschool - newschool mixed feeling
-You can change the gameframe
-A custom leveling points system
-A full trivia system
-So much more!
-Fixed bank all lag
-A full dicers rank
-Player stores + collecting and a custom ::myshop command

Now running on a 4G RAM 1 tb space VPS, so no lag.[/size]














[size=12pt]I hope to see you ingame, we still have a lack of staff.[/size]

Read full topic
